Name: Moments Captured in Light
Description: A WavesLine message arrives from a strange account named "Lightborne Horizons." With almost contagious enthusiasm, the sender invites you to join a photography event called "Light Chaser Collection"…
QuestDesc: A WavesLine message arrives from a strange account named "Lightborne Horizons." With almost contagious enthusiasm, the sender invites you to join a photography event called "Light Chaser Collection"…

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since it's a time capsule event… I should start with the freshmen.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The shopping hub is always busy. Shouldn't be hard to find someone willing to take a photo.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Eh? Wait, are you… you're {Male=him;Female=her}, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I mean, the one I absolutely spammed with messages... You still replied. You're {PlayerName}, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I'm really sorry about that. I must have been a huge nuisance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here, this is for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Canned Surprise!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, sweets fix bad moods. With any luck, it'll help me recover a few first-impression points.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, almost forgot to introduce myself!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm Lianna, Department of Engineering, current leader of the Photography Fan Club.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nice to meet you, {PlayerName}! Welcome to the Light Chaser Collection sign-up station.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since you're already here, want to register? The event is still open!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Right, right. Guess I'll be your narrator this time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem! The Light Chaser Collection follows what I mentioned in the messages. Our annual tradition.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But this year, we're aiming a little higher.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Besides capturing the new semester and everyday life, we want to see the little sparks between people.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, photos with others, or for others... that's what we're really hoping to see.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That way, at graduation, more students will get to open a time capsule full of memories they shared together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So? Feeling even a little inspired?

Options.PlotLineKey: I need more time to decide…
Do I get rewards or something?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come on, come on. Please sign up! Join the fun!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry. We've got that covered.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rewards are fantastic this year. Not only do you get royalties, but if you submit over three sets you'll even earn "Event Collaborator" credits!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And I added a few extras myself: snacks, fan club merch, that sort of stuff. Added them secretly though, hehe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I knew you'd say yes! Then it's decided.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm… I have a feeling that you might capture something really special.

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, h-hello.

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I… um… what do you need?

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm new here, still trying to figure everything out…

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I-I might not be very helpful…

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Eh? Take a picture of me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: F-for a time capsule event?

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That sounds… really nice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I… I don't really do photos...

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Back home… being a Resonator wasn't accepted.

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: People avoided me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sometimes they took photos of me, but it was like they were documenting a "freak."

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So I…

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …I started avoiding cameras.

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm only here to photograph wonderful things.

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I see.

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This place really is different. The way everyone looks at you… the students, the teachers…

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They're calm. Kind...

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It feels like I don't have to hide anymore.

Options.PlotLineKey: Then why not mark that fresh start with a photo?

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Okay.

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: H-how about here? The view is pretty…

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't really know how to pose… Is this alright?

Options.PlotLineKey: Good light and a good view, that's all I need.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lip gloss, blush, eyeshadow… No, matte is so pedestrian.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh… I knew it. It needs to be glassy. Something elegant, but not too obvious, to complement my natural beauty.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rose pink, out of stock… Champagne, out of stock…

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The "Light Chaser Collection"?

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh—that fan club event. The one that's been spamming my Terminal for two days straight.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I thought the system had glitched. The notifications would not stop.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry, I'm not really inter—

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …W-wait.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Have I… seen you somewhere? Was it in that article going around...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You—Could it really be...

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Laureate of Ragunna, the Champion of Septimont…

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you the hero who saved Rinascita?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "{Male=He;Female=She} returned from the depths of the Dark Tide, making the sky and sea remember the roar of dawn once more!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Courageous? Absolutely!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Dashing? Rumor has it!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Mad? Perhaps! But in a world this absurd, a dash of romantic insanity is only fitting."

Options.PlotLineKey: …Is this a new Troupe of Fools play?
...I can tell exactly where you're from.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem. So, is the famed hero of Rinascita asking to take my picture?

Options.PlotLineKey: …You can think of it that way.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wonderful. I, Rosalia, would never refuse such an honor.

Options.PlotLineKey: (You ready your Terminal to take her photo.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, my hair's a little messy, and is this pose...? Oh, never mind.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This will do. I am perfect already, just as I am.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …This one. Oh, not bad at all!

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If this is going into a time capsule, I do enjoy knowing my looks will be preserved like this for years to come.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And if you'd like a copy for yourself… I suppose that's fine too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rosalia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After all, it's a masterpiece captured by the hero {Male=himself;Female=herself}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Miro
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello! I've seen you running all over with your Terminal. Are you taking photos?

Dialogues.Speaker: Miro
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's for the "Light Chaser Collection," right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Miro
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fantastic! We were just talking about getting a group shot together! The one that'll go into the time capsule, like the message said.

Dialogues.Speaker: Miro
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Me, Solvik, Muse, and Flaer. All four of us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Musen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We were just chatting about whether we'll end up becoming "real grown-ups" by graduation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Musen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So we figured, leaving a small memento for our future selves might be a good idea.

Dialogues.Speaker: Musen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, it's a bit embarrassing to say out loud… but I want to be a Synchronist someday.

Dialogues.Speaker: Musen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Miro and Solvik are more into engineering. Maybe they'll even make it into the Institute.

Dialogues.Speaker: Solvik
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's make a bet right now. First one to publish a paper in Spectrum wins.

Dialogues.Speaker: Miro
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa, whoa! That's a top-tier publication journal… Let's not get ahead of ourselves.

Dialogues.Speaker: Musen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way, what about you, Flaer? What do you want to do?

Dialogues.Speaker: Musen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I kinda get the feeling you're an all-rounder.

Dialogues.Speaker: Flaer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Me? I haven't decided yet…

Dialogues.Speaker: Flaer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …I've always gone along with what others expected of me. Followed the path they laid out for me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Flaer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So honestly, I don't know what kind of person I want to become…

Options.PlotLineKey: Maybe you'll find a goal and meaning here.
Don't worry. Just follow your heart.

Dialogues.Speaker: Flaer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're right…

Dialogues.Speaker: Musen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All the more reason to get that group shot!

Dialogues.Speaker: Musen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since none of us can predict the future, let's at least make sure our future selves remember who we were when we started.

Dialogues.Speaker: Solvik
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I bet I'll be even more handsome six years from now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Flaer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looks-wise… I don't think I'll change that much…

Dialogues.Speaker: Miro
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, alright! Save the speech for later. Everyone hold still and SMILE!

Dialogues.Speaker: Miro
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, this one's great! And I didn't blink this time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Miro
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Flaer, all I'm seeing are teeth...

Dialogues.Speaker: Flaer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: C-come on, don't point that out…

Dialogues.Speaker: Solvik
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Musen, your hair is covering like a fifth of my face.

Dialogues.Speaker: Musen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? It's barely covering anything…

Dialogues.Speaker: Solvik
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's fine. I don't mind. Gives me a mysterious, dashing aura.

Dialogues.Speaker: Miro
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Funny thing is, we only met a few days ago. We're all freshmen who happen to have dorms right next to each other.

Dialogues.Speaker: Musen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …But it feels like we've known each other forever.

Dialogues.Speaker: Solvik
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, maybe that's fate.

Dialogues.Speaker: Flaer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Or… a tiny miracle born from random cosmic chance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Miro
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Musen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'll remember this moment for sure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Flaer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Will the photo… fade someday?

Dialogues.Speaker: Solvik
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe. But the four of us? We'll always be friends, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I think I'm almost done with the shopping hub…

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Next spot… I should check out the classrooms.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looks like some students are studying here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, you got it right this time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nice. At this rate, Energy Sciences might as well prepare your invitation letter early.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yoren
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe… thanks for helping me, Chuji.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I always thought your personality fit Engineering better…

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But seeing you dig your heels in for what you believe in… I have to admit, it's admirable.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Anyway. Who knows what the future holds.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, sorry, were we being too loud?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So… I'm taking photos for the Photography Fan Club's "Light Chaser Collection." You two looked so in the zone, and I wanted to capture that moment.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If it bothers you, I can delete it right away.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But if you don't mind... could I submit this photo for the event?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hm? You took this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The lighting is really good...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yoren
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow, this one looks amazing!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yoren
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, no, no! T-that's not what I meant... You always look good, Chuji!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Stop. Don't get cheeky with me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem. Anyway, if you want to get into Energy Sciences, you've gotta keep grinding.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yoren
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I-I know…

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Slightly flustered) Ugh, you're impossible…

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, you mentioned the event. What exactly is it?

Options.PlotLineKey: (Explain the Light Chaser Collection in detail.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see… Right, I remember now. I thought about joining a few years ago, but I always got too busy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now I'm not even a freshman anymore, anyway.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yoren
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've heard of it too… but I've been so busy catching up on my studies with Chuji that I never looked into it…

Options.PlotLineKey: It's fine if you can't participate.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, no. Since the opportunity is right in front of us, it'd be a waste to pass it up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What do you think, Yoren? You're okay with that, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yoren
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I-I'll follow your lead, Chuji!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perfect. It's decided then. I'll leave the submission to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't help wondering… when I graduate, or when Yoren does, what will we be like?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I hope he manages to make me a little proud by then.

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Just"? There is no "just" on the battlefield!

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Every item you throw away could be a potential resource. Recycle it, reuse it, repurpose it—Understood?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Iroh
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, Mr. Trash Can sure knows what he's talking about…

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …I heard that! You will address me by my proper title!

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I am the Battle Interface for Next-Gen Operations! Your Tactical Instructor, B.1.N.G.O.!

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Currently, ahem… temporarily assigned to environmental cleanup duty.

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hm? Proper manners. Good attitude.

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Permission to proceed granted.

Dialogues.Speaker: Iroh
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm, that actually sounds fun.

Dialogues.Speaker: Iroh
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Griff, wanna try it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Griff
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure! How could I miss something this interesting? But…

Dialogues.Speaker: Griff
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, hey, can we invite Instructor B.1.N.G.O. to join us?

Options.PlotLineKey: As long as the Instructor agrees…
As long as Mr. Trash Can agrees…

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...INCORRECT TITLE USED!

Options.PlotLineKey: As long as the Instructor agrees…

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Good.

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: From a morale-efficiency standpoint, group photos enhance unit cohesion.

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: —Photography request approved!

Dialogues.Speaker: Iroh
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, Tactical Instructor, what's your approved pose for a good photo?

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: STAND AT ATTENTION! CHINS UP! EYES FORWARD!

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is the standard posture for taking a picture!

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Also, please ensure the archived file is labeled with my full operational name.

Options.PlotLineKey: Understood, Battle Interface for Next-Gen Operations.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Five photo sets... that should just about do it.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Time to find Lianna and ask about the submission.

Dialogues.Speaker: Iroh
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My posture's good, but… my expression still isn't serious enough.

Dialogues.Speaker: Griff
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha! If you stopped grinning, we'd look like we're standing here as punishment.

Dialogues.Speaker: Griff
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But the Instructor though, looks ready for war as usual.

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Naturally!

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Combat Command No. 1: Seize the initiative and demoralize the enemy with superior aura!

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And I have a note… the metallic glare on my left shoulder exceeded optimal reflectance in the photo. Adjust your lighting angle next time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Iroh
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? Does that mean you're planning to join the next Light Chaser Collection too, Instructor?

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The growth records of exemplary cadets must be archived regularly.

Dialogues.Speaker: Iroh
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then it's settled! Next year's Light Chaser Collection, let's take another group picture together!

Dialogues.Speaker: Griff
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Deal! No take-backsies!

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Agreement confirmed. Data saved to long-term memory.

Dialogues.Speaker: B.1.N.G.O.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For the fifth Light Chaser Collection, the Battle Interface for Next-Gen Operations will perform the photography mission at elevated standards, correcting each cadet's posture and spirit at any moment!

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It… wasn't as scary as I thought.

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I wish I smiled a little more. It might've looked better.

Options.PlotLineKey: Then I'll take another one for you on graduation day.
I'm sure your smile then will light up the room.

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh… thank you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Reina
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I think… when that day comes, I'll remember today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, {PlayerName}! Looks like everything went smoothly.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, mind if I take an early peek at your results? I've been dying to know... What does Startorch Academy look like through your eyes?

Options.PlotLineKey: (Take out the Terminal and show her the pictures.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …These are wonderful.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can feel it. The eyes behind the lens are thoughtful and kind.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everyone's smiling so naturally… Those are the kinds of expressions people only show to someone they trust.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But—

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I found a little secret.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're not in a single one of them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Did you get so caught up capturing everyone else that you forgot to leave something for yourself?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In that case… how about taking a photo with us? With the whole Photography Fan Club.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Today's a fan club activity day anyway, and everyone's here. You may not be an official member, at least not yet, but you're already a storyteller.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I… actually get scared of "forgetting."

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm always afraid that if I don't collect these precious moments, time will take them away, and I'll never find them again...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, {PlayerName}… let's at least freeze this moment together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe someday, when you look at this old, faded photograph, it'll pull you and all of us back to this little piece of time we shared.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, everyone! Group photo with our new friend!

Dialogues.Speaker: Enthusiastic Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure!

Dialogues.Speaker: Helpful Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, {PlayerName} should stand in the middle!

Dialogues.Speaker: Helpful Fan Club Member
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yep! Come on, come on. The spot of honor goes to our guest of honor!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lianna
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Ready—

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That girl's a freshman too.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But she doesn't look very… approachable.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Well, no harm in trying.

Dialogues.Speaker: Miro
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, you there!

Dialogues.Speaker: Miro
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Over here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yoren
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This question… I'm sorry. I think I got it wrong again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You messed up the second step again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chuji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Stop just memorizing. Here—read this part again. You need to understand how crystals store energy first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yoren
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah… so I had the flow path reversed…

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (A moment in time that makes you slow down…)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Hmm… maybe years from now, the moments we'll miss most are still these quiet, soft ones.)

Options.PlotLineKey: (Lift the Terminal and press the shutter.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sounds lively over there. I should take a look.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That girl over there… judging by her uniform, she must be a freshman.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Worth a try…
